Class Stat

  • public class Stat
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility class for statistical functions.

    • Method Detail

      • median

        public static double median(double[] array)
        Calculate the median value of an array.

        The median of a set of numbers is defined as the value X for which there are as many elements < X as there are > X.

        Returns:
        median value

      • pretty

        public static double pretty(double val)
        Round the given value to 1 decimal place
        Parameters:
        val - value
        Returns:
        value rounded to 1 decimal place

      • rmse

        public static double rmse(double[] array,
                          double value)
        Calculate the root of the mean squared error (RMSE) of an array in comparison with a predicted value.
        Parameters:
        array - values to predict
        value - predicted value
        Returns:
        the root mean squared error
